MRW I see people post hype walls

![qSvB1F6.gif](http://i.imgur.com/qSvB1F6.gif)

Seriously, please don't hype wall. It's just another load of text to scroll through, it annoys people, it's hard to trim, and it's plain unnecessary. A line or two of Hype is enough, thank you.
